channel.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
channel.description: Basically i'm bored of the games i have, last time i got the three Age of Empire disks but you can only play that so often before you need another game. So, this Thursday i'm hoping to get another game, i was looking at Skyrim for xbox but i'm not sure but it is only 23 dollars. What games, if Skyrim is a bad choice, do you think i should look for? Any game should be fine except zombie games, i'm not fond of them.

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

Jak and daxter series kinda childish but it’s a good campaign and a huge story line to follow there’s like 4 or 5 games so far and they’re all cheap. Watch some youtube video’s about it. good luck

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I wont be buying games for a while but check out Natural Selection 2. Better yet, check out FRANKIEonPCin1080p’s second video on it. It’s an alien vs marine game, kind of like Alien vs Predator but better.

item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

vortex:

la mulana

This. Very awesome game with great aesthetics and a very cool soundtrack!
It’s also pretty difficult, which is what I like to see in games!

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:9, topic:526695”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=645442.msg4341452#msg4341452 date=1375223932]
Campaign, i don’t play online.
[/quote]
Why not?[/quote]
I don’t have proper internet to play online.

I’ve kept an eye out for the games you guys have been suggesting but i haven’t found anything yet. I’ll take another look then the sales go on again, thanks for your suggestions!

Read full topic

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

What type of games do you like though?
Since it seems like you have an xbox that game that’s free with gold right now is good (crackdown), it’s like a mix of gta and saints row but your the good guy. For a free game it’s worth checking out.

item.title: Getting a new game - what should i get?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Payday 2 is a game coming out this 13th, it looks extremely promising and is only 40.00 USD.

The ultimate edition of Skyrim is worth getting, as it comes with all of the DLC :).

Minecraft is a rather fun game if you’re into those sorts of games and can keep you busy for quite a while.

Read full topic

[/quote]
I’ve seen it but never really knew what it was about, just a war game i assume?[/quote]

yeah basically just a war game. fantastic graphics though.

OT: umm what exactly are you looking for? a campaign type of deal or mostly multiplayer with friends?
